episodes.title: The Lever Adventure
episodes.description: Oliver discovers how levers work by building a see-saw! Learn about simple machines and how they make our lives easier through fun experiments and examples.
episodes.show_notes_html:
In this episode, Oliver explores the amazing world of levers and discovers how they're used everywhere!

Learning Objectives

  • Understand how levers work
  • Learn about fulcrums and mechanical advantage
  • Identify levers in everyday objects

Key Concepts

  • Simple machines
  • Physics and force
  • Engineering principles

Try It Yourself!

Build your own lever at home using a ruler, a pencil, and some small objects. Can you lift something heavy with less effort?
episodes.show_notes_text: In this episode, Oliver explores the amazing world of levers and discovers how they're used everywhere! Learning Objectives: Understand how levers work, Learn about fulcrums and mechanical advantage, Identify levers in everyday objects. Key Concepts: Simple machines, Physics and force, Engineering principles. Try It Yourself! Build your own lever at home using a ruler, a pencil, and some small objects.

episodes.title: The Light Bulb Revolution
episodes.description: Join Oliver as he discovers how Thomas Edison and other inventors created the light bulb and changed the world forever! Learn about electricity, innovation, and persistence.
episodes.show_notes_html:
Oliver tells the inspiring story of the light bulb and the inventors who never gave up!

Learning Objectives

  • Learn about Thomas Edison and his experiments
  • Understand how electricity creates light
  • Discover the importance of persistence in invention

Key Concepts

  • Electricity and circuits
  • Innovation and experimentation
  • History of technology

Fun Fact

Did you know Edison tested over 3,000 different materials before finding the right filament for the light bulb?
